text.wishText: Semoga semua harapanmu tercapai. Sukses selalu.

text.text2: Itu yang sebenarnya mau aku lakuin.

text.outroText: Dah gitu aja. Sekarang bilang sama aku kalo kamu suka ini atau tidak.

text.greetingText: I really like your name btw!
text.wishText: Hope all your wishes come true. The older I get, the more I realize that I am still a little younger than you.
text.textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text.text2: That's what I was going to do.
text.text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
text.outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
text.replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
